title: Avocado and Tropical-Fruit Salsa
directions: Gently toss together all ingredients with salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 2 cups finely diced tropical fruit such as kiwi, pineapple, mango, and papaya
2 California avocados, pitted, peeled, and cut into 1/4-inch dice
1 fresh serrano or jalape√±o chile, seeded and finely chopped
